name: rainy day (yuandan)
description:
An endless side-scroller cloud game inspired by the Dinosaur Chrome game. Collect water to grow big and put out fires! But if you lose too much water you get tiny and disappear :( 

Made for the ITP class The New Arcade to be played with a controller that I made to go along with the project.

Keyboard Controls:

Hold space to rise (also @ start screen) – avoid bumping into birds and houses/trees!

Hold Z to rain

Hold X over ponds to collect water
